Question ID 337 – Metrics calculation – same level of precision
Release date
May 2024
Question asked
When calculating metrics for sustainability matters that are material for a group, do the data of
all subsidiaries have to be considered with the same level of accuracy even if the matter is not
material for some subsidiaries of the group?
ESRS reference
ESRS 1 chapter 2 Qualitative characteristics of information
Key terms
Metrics calculation – same level of accuracy
